ChangeLog.Change: Added buffers implementation (BufferTyped, BufferRaw, StackBuffer, BufferRange)
Nullable returns "Unknown error", when no exception is set.
Nullable R-value Get implementation.
Added ExceptionList class and ErrorCollector to handle multple exceptions.
Saving string to file functionality (filesystem::File::Save).
Added IndexedGeometryBuffer implemented as RawBuffers.
Mock shaders creation will fail, if shader file doesn't exist.
Fix DX11 BlendingState creation - set DestBlendAlpha.
Added rendering functionality (RenderingSystem, Visual, Drawing classes).
PathsManager introduced. GUI can register path aliases.
Rendering system template shaders for DirectX.
SolidColorBrush introduced.
Rectangle geometry and Rectangle control introduced.
Geometry generation framework with processing introduced.
Compiletime and runtime validation mechanisms added.
Rectangle and circle generators implemented.
PlanarUV processor implemented.
RectangleWithBorder for GUI implemented.
Code migrated from DirectX SDK to Windows SDK.
Added flush to Renderer commands.
Texture content update.
